summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on an urban road. The road is relatively clear with moderate traffic. A motorcycle is seen on the right side of the road, moving ahead of the self-driving vehicle. The motorcycle maintains a safe distance and does not pose any immediate threat.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and direction. The driver is likely monitoring the motorcycle on the right side to ensure it does not suddenly change lanes or cut in front.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A motorcycle, approximately 10 meters away, moving ahead in the same lane, maintaining a safe distance.
